creator: jdhancock@parker.com
text:
Just a documentation recommendation.  Since Tomcat does not compile a jsp until 
it finds a proper BUILD.XML file (I assume). It would be helpful to document 
the location of the BUILD.XML file as well as the contents.  Maybe a simple 
HELLOWORLD example.  
I have searched various forums on Tomcat and to my knowledge no one has ever 
used TOMCAT 5 with JSP pages.  They do not compile.
The Tomcat documentation says they are automatically compiled but this is not 
true.
Resolution was no help.  A location of the resolution would be helpful.
creator: jdhancock@parker.com

text:
Hello Jeff,

please send those request at the tomcat user mailing list, after you 
read the docs.


Here the current availbale information:

http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-5.0-doc/jasper-howto.html

Deployer App has a complete remote env to build, compile jsp, build war and deploy.
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-5.0-doc/deployer-howto.html

download deployer bundle ( change to faviorit site at
http://jakarta.apache.org/site/binindex.cgi)
http://www.apache.de/dist/jakarta/tomcat-5/v5.0.19/bin/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.19-deployer.zip

Regards
Peter
creator: pr@webapp.de
